creator: lesanti@sinectis.com.ar
text:
It seems that a recent (ie post 1.3.31) change to ap_auth_nonce() makes 
digest authentication behave erratically when using mod_digest.so.

The change was meant to include the local *endpoint* in the nonce 
generation, but the code is still passing a pointer to the local *address*.

Please, take a look at the patch for more information.

Leandro.
Yes, sorry about that.  An equivalent patch has already gone in for 1.3.34.
creator: jorton@redhat.com

text:
You can test the patch that went in to be doubly-safe! 

http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi?rev=156287&view=rev
creator: jorton@redhat.com
james@jamesholmes.com
text: *** Bug 29379 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
